mapper.insert:
insert into taobao_order ( order_id, order_no, buyer_name, order_price, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, goods_title, order_channel, pay_time, order_coupon, block_flag, order_status, create_time ) values
(#{item.orderId}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.buyerName}, #{item.price}, #{item.receiverName}, #{item.receiverPhone}, #{item.receiverAddress}, #{item.goodsTitle}, #{item.channel}, #{item.payTime}, #{item.coupon}, #{item.blockFlag}, #{item.status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{item.createAt})
